data.title: Children Traveling Alone
data.text: Airport City Unaccompanied Minor Pick-up Location HNL Honolulu, Oahu Parent or responsible adult should check-in with a Hawaiian Airlines agent in Terminal 1, Lobby 2 or Lobby 3, to receive a gate pass to meet their child at the arrival gate. OGG Kahului, Maui Baggage claim, located at far end of baggage carousel. Gate pass are available at the ticket counter. JHM Kapalua, Maui No designated pick-up location. Parent or responsible adult should check with ticket counter for further instructions. ITO Hilo, Hawaii Island No designated pick-up location. Parent or responsible adult should check with ticket counter for further instructions. KOA Kona, Hawaii Island Parent or responsible adult can pick up the unaccompanied minor at the exit door of the holding area. LIH Lihue, Kauai Parent or responsible adult can pick up the unaccompanied minor at the Baggage Service Office. LNY Lanai City, Lanai In front of the main terminal entrance next to the Security Desk. MKK Hoolehua, Molokai Meet at the arrival gate in the baggage claim area. LAS Las Vegas, NV Please report to the ticket counter one (1) hour prior to arrival of aircraft for your gate pass. One (1) adult will be allowed through security to pick up the child. LAX Los Angeles, CA Parent or responsible adult can pick up the unaccompanied minor at the Baggage Service Office. SMF Sacramento, CA A Hawaiian Airlines agent will attempt to contact the adult listed in the reservation and make arrangements and issue a gate pass. If unable to contact, the unaccompanied minor can be picked up at the Baggage Service Office. SFO San Francisco, CA Parent or responsible adult must go to the security check point. A Hawaiian Airlines agent will escort the unaccompanied minor to security. Signature and picture ID is required for pick up. Hawaiian Airlines agent will try and contact parent or responsible adult before arrival of aircraft to advise estimated time of arrival. Please make sure to add your cell and home phone numbers to your reservation for courtesy call. SAN San Diego, CA Parent or responsible adult can pick up the unaccompanied minor at the Baggage Service Desk near carousel 3. Gate passes will not be issued for arrivals. OAK Oakland, CA Parent or responsible adult must wait outside of security. An agent will escort the unaccompanied minor to the adult after all passengers have deplaned. PHX Phoenix, AZ Parent or responsible adult must go to the security check point. A Hawaiian Airlines agent will escort the unaccompanied minor to security. Signature and picture ID is required for pick up. Hawaiian Airlines agent will try and contact parent or responsible adult before arrival of aircraft to advise estimated time of arrival. Please make sure to add your cell and home phone numbers to your reservation for courtesy call. PDX Portland, OR Parent or responsible adult must check-in at the Hawaiian Airlines ticket counter. A Hawaiian Airlines agent will issue gate pass to meet unaccompanied minor at gate. Please contact an agent on duty at (503) 572-8848 to obtain a gate pass or to coordinate pickup if you arrive too close to arrival time. SJC San Jose, CA Parent or responsible adult must wait outside of security. An agent will escort the unaccompanied minor to the adult after all passengers have deplaned. SEA Seattle, WA Parent or responsible adult must check in with a Hawaiian Airlines agent at baggage claim. Hawaiian Airlines agent will not be available at baggage claim until approximately 20-30 minutes after the arrival of the unaccompanied minor's flight. The Hawaiian Airlines agent will then escort the unaccompanied minor to baggage claim (Carousel 1). BOS Boston, MA Parent or responsible adult can pick up the unaccompanied minor at Carousel 1 near the Dunkinâ€™ Donuts. Gate passes will not be issued for arrivals. JFK New, York, NY Parent or responsible adult can pick up the unaccompanied minor at the Baggage Service Office.
